Title: Valid credentials - successful login
Steps: Enter valid email and password | Click on 'Login' button
Expected: User is redirected to their dashboard

Title: Incorrect credentials - unsuccessful login
Steps: Enter invalid email and password | Click on 'Login' button
Expected: Error message displayed for invalid credentials

Title: Three incorrect login attempts - account locking
Steps: Enter incorrect password thrice | Click on 'Login' button

Title: Forgot Password link functionality
Steps: Click on 'Forgot Password' link | Follow password reset instructions
Expected: User can successfully reset their password

Title: Redirect to login page after password reset
Expected: User is redirected to the login page

Title: Incorrect email format validation
Steps: Enter an invalid email format | Click on 'Login' button
Expected: Error message displayed for incorrect email format

Title: Empty email or password validation
Steps: Leave the email field empty | Click on 'Login' button
Expected: Error message displayed for empty fields

Title: Password length validation
Steps: Enter a password with less than 6 characters | Click on 'Login' button
Expected: Error message displayed for password length
